Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnPrint: if trim(SCHeader) <> "" then SCSubHeaderCtl.Visible = False SCHeaderCtl.Visible = True SCHeaderCtl.BackStyle = 1 TopLine1.Visible = True elseif trim(SCSubHeader) <> "" then SCSubHeaderCtl.Visible = True SCHeaderCtl.Visible = True SCHeaderCtl.BackStyle = 1 TopLine1.Visible = False else SCSubHeaderCtl.Visible = False SCHeaderCtl.Visible = False SCHeaderCtl.BackStyle = 0 TopLine1.Visible = False end if

Field.Name: specificationsCtl
Field.Text: Replace(IIF(trim(class_id)= "", "",IIF(InStr(1, trim(specifications), "<LF>") = 0, trim(specifications), left(trim(specifications), InStr(1, trim(specifications), "<LF>")))), "<", "", 1)

Field.Name: system_componentCtl1
Field.Text: "Model Costs calculated for a " & trim(bldg_stories) & " story building with " & trim(bldg_stories_hgt) & "' story height and " & Format(trim(bldg_area),"#,##0") & " square feet of floor area"

Field.Name: system_componentCtl1
Field.Text: "Common Additives for a " & trim(bldg_stories) & " story building with " & trim(bldg_stories_hgt) & "' story height and " & trim(bldg_area) & " square feet of floor area"

Field.Name: Label1
Field.Text: Cost per Square Foot of Living Area
